step.name: Notify Order Completion to Deploy Team

staticBinding.value:
Olá equipe,

O pedido ${SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID} foi processado com êxito no Portal do aCP.

Order details - Server details

Server Name - ${vmHostname}
Server ID - ${vmId}
Server OS - ${osType}
Server IP - ${ipAddress}
Server Size - ${serverSize}
DataCenter - ${datacenterName}
Country - ${Country}

Esta mensagem foi gerada automaticamente. Por favor não responda este e-mail.

Obrigado,
DXC.technology

 _________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Hello Team,

The order ${SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID} has successfully been processed through the aCP Portal.

Order details - Server details

Server Name - ${vmHostname}
Server ID - ${vmId}
Server OS - ${osType}
Server IP - ${ipAddress}
Server Size - ${serverSize}
DataCenter - ${datacenterName}
Country - ${Country}

This is an automatically generated message. Please do not reply directly to this email.

Thank you,
DXC.technology
